thread.title: Consultant Eric Herrera Named Director of Sales for Kolbe Corp
thread.title_full: Consultant Eric Herrera Named Director of Sales for Kolbe Corp

author: Mark Nageotte
title: Consultant Eric Herrera Named Director of Sales for Kolbe Corp
text:
In response to strong worldwide demand for its instinctive strengths assessments, teambuilding solutions and business development services, Kolbe Corp recently named business consultant Eric Herrera as director of sales for the Phoenix-based organization. After several years as marketing director for another assessment organization, Herrera transitioned to an independent consulting role, where he focused on helping numerous clients to increase productivity, streamline existing processes, and maximize revenue. During his career, Herrera has also trained thousands of sales professionals in numerous industries and recently developed a six-month leadership training program for business clients.
While working with a large consumer electronics company, Herrera implemented a sales and leadership development program that helped the company to increase top-line revenue by $31 million.
“We’re very excited to have a sales professional with Eric’s leadership background joining our team,” said David Kolbe, CEO of Kolbe Corp. “His experience as trainer, consultant, and marketing director in an industry that complements our own makes him a valuable resource for our clients, our internal sales team and our worldwide network of Kolbe CertifiedTM Consultants. We look forward to having Eric help us provide Kolbe assessments and teambuilding solutions to people in more countries and in more languages in the years ahead.”
Herrera has earned several professional certifications and achieved his bachelor’s degree in Business Management at Indiana Institute of Technology.
About Kolbe Corp
For 40 years, Phoenix-based Kolbe Corp has helped people identify their instinctive talents and use their innate abilities to succeed. More than one million individuals have completed Kolbe assessments. Respondents have ranged in age from 4 to 88 years old and include a wide range of ethnic, racial and socio-economic backgrounds, and all job classifications.
Kolbe Corp strives to identify the nature of creative instincts and enable individuals to unleash the boundless power of their own natural instincts to improve personal productivity, enrich relationships, and launch rewarding careers. Employers can use many Kolbe resources to develop highly productive and stable teams while raising overall morale.
Kolbe’s online assessment, the Kolbe A™ Index, is used by individuals and organizations throughout the United States and in 34 other countries on five continents to find and develop top talent, increase productivity and build effective teams. Kolbe solutions are currently available in English, Spanish, French, and German.
